data_sources_explanation.why_no_data: This appears to be a relatively new property (built 2018-2020) in a modern development. New builds often have limited public transaction history, and the specific property may not have been resold since original purchase.
alternative_data_methods: Visit Land Registry website directly and search by address
Use HM Land Registry's Title Register service (£3 per search)
Contact local estate agents for market valuations
Check Harrogate Council planning portal for development details
